attributes.action: Learn how to show proper respect for the fallen when saluting them at the Cenotaph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are upset by the Prime Minister's inability to show common decency towards the fallen, some of whom have even died as a direct result of his own governments incompetence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
